channel.title: Npc dialogue
channel.description:
Hi, im just here to ask can someone make me a mini TuT On how to make npc's say stuff? Im really puzzled with this. And as a first time java coder, im a bit dumb on it. ( Im getting Java for dummies for crimbo!! )
Anyway, i just want my npc's to say stuff. Its really confusing. Thanks.
